name: /vrpgm/ Jam 2021 - Goburin no Tower
description:
A mysterious tower. An abducted girl. Join forces with the patrons of the local bar and seek the treasures of the Goblin's tower.

VERSION UPDATES

V1.03A/B - Minor fixes, now includes full RTP in files so that you may play the game, HOPEFULLY  without having to install RTP. However, possibility still exists that you may need to install RTP. See included changelog.

V1.03 - Many extensive, small changes and minor bugfixes

V1.02 - 2F Gym Shower now functions as intended (one-time full heal)

V1.01 - Fixed a progress-breaking bug on the 2nd floor

V1.00 - Removed debugging events from Crafting screen and Dream Board

FEATURES

- Build your party from 4 arguably different characters with special skills

- Steal *AUTOMATICALLY without wasting precious turns

- Talk to SOME of your foes

- Develop (YOU)'re hero in the dream world and power up on the "Dream Board."

- "Multiple" endings (there was nearly a 3rd due to a game breaking eventing fail)

- Crisp, legible MS Gothic font

- Music on SOME of the maps

*it's still random but at least it's random without you literally wasting entire turns trying to steal stuff
